titleStmt.title: An anatomy of independency, or, A briefe commentary and moderate discourse upon the Apologeticall narration of Mr Thomas Goodwin and Mr Philip Nye, &c. by argument laying naked the dangers of their positions and from experience, discovering their spirits and wayes.
titleStmt.author: Forbes, Alexander, 17th cent.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Alexander Forbes. Cf. NUC pre 1956.
Reproduction of original in Thomason Collection, British Library.
